hero.title: SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
hero.subtitle: Our SEO services use data-driven strategies and optimization to boost visibility, increase organic traffic, and deliver sustainable long-term search performance.

sections.subtitle: SEO Strategy & Market Analysis
sections.description: We begin with a complete audit of your website and digital presence. Our team conducts in-depth industry and market analysis, competitor keyword and content benchmarking, audience intent and search behavior research, and current website performance evaluation. This enables us to define a clear roadmap based on high-value keywords and impactful ranking opportunities.

sections.subtitle: Technical SEO Optimization
sections.description: We ensure your website is fully optimized for search engine crawling, indexing, and performance. Our technical SEO work includes website speed optimization, mobile responsiveness improvements, fixing indexing and crawl errors, URL structure and sitemap enhancements, schema markup implementation, and on-page technical hygiene (meta tags, headers, alt texts). A technically sound website improves visibility and strengthens ranking potential.

sections.subtitle: On-Page & Content Optimization
sections.description: We optimize your content to match search intent and increase keyword relevance. Our on-page optimization includes keyword research and targeting, optimized landing pages, blog articles, and product descriptions, internal linking structure improvements, content gap analysis and recommendations, and meta titles, descriptions, and header optimization.

sections.subtitle: Off-Page SEO & Authority Building
sections.description: We enhance your website's credibility and authority across the web through ethical, high-quality tactics: backlink development and outreach, brand mentions and digital PR opportunities, competitor link analysis, and local SEO signals (Google Business Profile, citations, reviews).

sections.subtitle: Local SEO (If Applicable)
sections.description: For businesses targeting specific regions, we optimize your presence in local searches: Google Maps listing optimization, local keyword targeting, local directory management, and geo-targeted content strategies.

sections.subtitle: Continuous Monitoring, Optimization & Reporting
sections.description: SEO is an ongoing process. We continuously monitor performance and refine strategies based on ranking improvements, organic traffic growth, page performance analytics, keyword opportunities, and technical updates. We provide monthly reports with insights and actionable recommendations for sustained improvement. Why This Service Matters: SEO is essential for long-term digital success. Our systematic, full-spectrum approach helps your brand rank higher, attract qualified traffic, and build trust, without relying solely on paid advertising.

cta.title: Ready to Dominate Search Rankings?
cta.description: Let's optimize your online presence and drive sustainable organic growth.

sections.description: We manage regional media relations across MENA, covering online, print, TV, and radio outlets. Our team prepares full media kits, company fact sheets, and spokesperson profiles, coordinates interviews with clear briefing notes and talking points, and organizes press conferences and media roundtables to amplify brand presence.

sections.subtitle: Influencer & KOL PR
sections.description: Identifying the right influencers and KOLs through reputation fit and audience relevance analysis, then activates earned and hybrid outreach programs including PR seeding. We coordinate content to ensure alignment with brand messages and campaign objectives, and track performance across reach, engagement, sentiment, and conversions when applicable.

sections.subtitle: PR Monitoring, Reporting & Insights
sections.description: We provide full media monitoring across news, social, and digital channels, delivering detailed coverage analysis including volume, outlet tier, message pull-through, and tone/sentiment. We benchmark share of voice against competitors and issue monthly or quarterly PR performance reports with clear insights and recommendations.
